Hymn.Arabic: أَطْرُدُ أَعْدَائِي فَأُدْرِكُهُمْ ، وَلَا أَرْجِعُ حَتَّى أُفْنِيَهُمْ
Hymn.English: 37 I have pursued my enemies and overtaken them; Neither did I turn back again till they were destroyed.

Hymn.Arabic: أَعْطَيْتَنِي الظَّفَرَ عَلَى أَعْدَائِي ، وَمُبْغِضِيَّ اسْتَأْصَلْتَهُمْ. هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 40 You have also given me the necks of my enemies, So that I destroyed those who hated me.
